column62: Mind blowing mobile in this price budget.Camera is average quality .Network connectivity is strong.motorola
column68: Pretty good entry level phone with very good battery backup. Amazing user experience due to stock Android.Very light weight and display quality is gorgeous.Only thing below average is camera. Maybe it will improve after couple of updates.Edit after 3 months of usage: Camera quality has improved 10x after regular usageBattery backup is still good.Stock android experience is just Damn Good!! Super fast switching between apps and really smooth animations.Speaker is really loud and clear.motorola
